issue.title: [CI][R] R sanitizer job is not really working
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7880](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7880). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's not failing, but it's not doing useful things. It's building the C++ library, then installing the R package, but it's not finding the C++ library that was built, and then the rest of the build is not erroring but not actually working, just burning electricity.
